title: 06/25/2021 - HOUR 1 - Chris Paul, Kevin Love

description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin


Chris Paul doesn’t make the Suns worse, but he did last night 

Why did Kevin Love make the USA basketball roster?


Guest: Amin Elhassan
